A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointing overall. Kylo-ok. Rey-ok. Leia- what the hell was that at the beginning? Luke- so much for the hero of the last 40 years- he's a whiny crybaby now. Finn- that was just an absolutely terrible story line. As a life long Star Wars fan I watched TFA and Rogue One several times in theaters and then bought the videos when they came out. This is more like the prequel trilogy- one and done. They are going to be awfully disappointed when the box office numbers start to plummet after the initial rush. Such a waste.
